label: 熊野
対訳語: Center of the Kumano cult in Wakayama Prefecture
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Objective of many pilgrimages, especially in the medival period. Its three most important centers of worship are the main shrine on the Kumano River, Kumano Hongū (Kumano Nimasu); the new shrine, Kumano Shingū (Kumano no Hayatama), where the river empties into the Pacific Ocean at the present Shingu City; and Nachi (Kumano Nachi).
